Tengo una pequeña pulperia en la que vendo productos de consumo popular, como huevos, leche, panes, manteca, dulces, sodas. Mi negocio lo tengo desde hace 3 años. Este negocio es familiar ya que mi esP. e hijos me ayudan en las horas que me toca hacerles su comida o los fines de semana que pasan en la casa. Los ingresos que percibimos nos ayudan con los estudios y alimentacion de toda la familia.

loans.use: Compra de refrescos, galletas, dulces, panes, leche, huevos y otros.

loans.name: Glenda Suyapa

texts.en:
My name is Glenda G. and I'm dedicated to the sale of skin care products like creams, deoderants, and baby lotion. I've had my business for three years and my clients are my neighbors and my coworkers.

My goal is to increase my inventory and have a greater sale of products. With the profits that I obtain, I hope to be able to support my family and my son's studies.

Loan Use - To buy creams, deoderants, perfumes, powders, baby lotion, and vaseline

Me llamo Glenda G. y yo soy dedicado a la venta de productos de cuidado de piel como cremas, deoderants, y loción de bebé. He tenido mi negocio durante tres años y mis clientes son mis vecinos y mis colaboradores.

Mi meta es de aumentar mi inventario y tener una venta más grande de productos. Con las ganancias que obtengo, espero poder sostener mi familia y mis estudios de hijo.

loans.use: Compra de cremas, desodorantes, perfumes, talcos, lociones para bebes, vaselina

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.en:
I sell cheese, milk and other milk products. I have a moblile business and I distribute my products in general stores and small villages. I have been doing this for four years and my earning have been enough to cover family expenses. My wife sells drinks, charamuscas and ice to teh neighbors.

Loan Use: Purchase of cheese, milk and other milk products

Me dedico a la venta de queso, quesillo y mantequilla, mi negocio es ambulante ya que distribuyo el producto en pulperias y caserios. Tengo 4 años de dedicarme a esta actividad que me ha ido muy bien, los ingresos que he percibido me han ayudado a cubrir los gastos de mi familia. En mi casa mi esposa se encarga de verder a mis vecinos y a vender refrescos y charamuscas y hielo.

loans.use: Compra de queso, quesillo y mantequilla

loans.name: Digna Emerita

texts.en:
For a year now I have had a clothing business that sells mens womens and childrens clothing. On Monday, Tuesdays and Wednesdays, I travel to neighboring areas to sell in order to earn more money. My husband is a farmer. He only harvests one time per year. This is why we need to have a second income in order to pay for our children\'s food, health and education.

Loan Use: Purchase of blouses, skirts, shirts, socks, handkerchiefs and other supplies

Tengo un año de tener mi negocio en el que vendo ropa para todas las edades para dama, caballero y niño. Tambien los dias lunes, martes y miercoles salgo a comunidades vecinas a vender de manera ambulante para tener mayor ingreso. Mi esposo se dedica a la agricultura y solamente cosecha 1 vez al año, por lo que necesitamos tener otros ingresos para mantener a mis hijos en sus estudios y darles alimentacion y salud.

loans.use: Compra de blusas, faldas, camisas, calcetines, pañuelos y otros.

loans.name: Bertha

texts.en:
Bertha is married and has three children; they are studying and also help her with the business. Bertha’s business is buying and selling sunglasses and fashion glasses, which she sells in a little store in a popular market. She is 33 years old and started her business in 2001 because she had to support her family; her business was successful and she was able to open another one in another popular market. Bertha wants to grow and create a better quality of life for her and her family. For this reason she works very hard to achieve her dream, and is now requesting a loan of US $ 1,200. With this loan she could purchase more merchandise in a greater quantity and obtain better and lower prices by buying the merchandise prior to the season, and in this way she could increase her income. She offers to re-pay this loan in 6 months at least.

**"This text has been translated from the following original business description."

Bertha esta casada y tiene tres hijos que están aún estudiando y también ellos la ayudan en el negocio. El negocio al que se dedica es venta de lentes para sol y casuales, los vende en un puesto que tiene ubicado en un tianguis o mercado popular. Bertha tiene 33 años de edad y empezó su negocio en al año 2001 por que tenía que mantener a su familia y como le fue bien con su negocio tuvo la oportunidad de abrir otro en otro mercado popular. Bertha tiene deseos de salir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia por ello trabaja mucho para lograrlo y esta solicitando un préstamo por US$ 1,200 que le servirán para poder comprar más mercancía nueva en grandes lotes a menor precio comprando ahora antes de que empiece la temporada y así poder tener un mayor margen de utilidad. Ella espera pagar el préstamo en 6 meses y espera le brinden ese apoyo económico.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.en:
I sell clothes and shoes, My store is called Bazar S., which I have had for 3 years and has produced very good earnings and continues to grow. I have many customers who prefer the quality of my clothes and the good prices. This helps me to support my children and finance their education.

Loan Use: Purchase of clothes and shoes

Me dedico a la venta de ropa y zapatos, tengo mi negocio que se llama Bazar S., del que he tenido muy buenos ingresos ya que tengo 3 años de tenerlo y con los años ha ido creciendo. Tengo una buena clientela quienes me prefieren por la calidad de ropa y buenos precios que les ofrezco. Esto me ayuda a poder ayudar a mis hijos y apoyarles en sus estudios.

loans.use: Compra de ropa y calzado

loans.name: Humberto

texts.en:
I have a small grocery store in my house. Little by little the business has been growing. My dream is to build a warehouse. It was difficult for me to find a job, so I started a small business to cover family and healthcare costs. My children have given me capital to buy some products. I need more capital to invest in my business since my clientele is growing and I need new products to have more income.

Loan Use: Purchase of milk, eggs, softdrinks, butter, salt, to sugar, rice and other products

Tengo una pulperia instalada en mi casa de habitacion, poco a poco mi negocio ha ido creciendo, mi sueño es poder tener una bodega. Se me ha hecho dificil encontrar trabajo por lo que tuve que iniciar mi pequeño negocio para cubrir los gastos de mi familia y mi salud. Actualmente mis hijos me han ayudado con capital para comprar algunos productos, pero necesito capital de trabajo para poder surtir mi negocio ya que la clientela esta creciendo y se que teniendo nuevo productos tendre mas ingresos.

loans.use: Compra de leche, huevos, refrescos, manteca, espaguetis, sal, azucar, arros y otros

loans.name: Elias Antonio

texts.en:
My name is Elias Antonio. My wife and I have worked grinding corn for eight years. This business has allowed me to support our family and put our kids through school. At the moment we need to replace some of the parts of the machinery for our business so we can continue giving our clients good service.

Mi Nombre es Elias Antonio, cuento con un molino de moler maiz, ubicado en el centro de mi comunidad, tengo 8 años de dedicarme a este tipo de negocio en el que me colabora mi esposa, este negocio los genera ingresos para cubrir los gastos familiares, y gastos de educacion de mis hijos, pero actualmente nesecitamos cambiar algunas piezas para un mejor funcionamiento del mismo y poder dar un mejor servicio a nuestros cliente.

loans.use: compra de platos, banda y Motor  de molino para moler maíz

loans.name: Eden Eli

texts.en:
Everyone knows my business as \\\"La Troca Intima\\\". I have been selling intimate apparell for men and women for five years. I have been able to establish a good clientelle that purchase my clothes that they later resell in their stores. With the profits of my business i have been able to build my house and support my family. I am in need of making some repairs to my home so I need to be able to increase my sales to cover the costs.

Loan Use: Purchase underwear for men and women

Todos conocen mi negocio por su nombre particular LA TROCA INTIMA, me dedico a vender ropa intima de dama y caballeros, tengo cinco años de vender en el mercado de esta ciudad. He logrado obtener mi propia clientela quienes me compran buenas cantidades de ropa para vender en sus aldeas. Con los ingresos que he obtenido de las ventas logre construir mi casita y cubrir los gastos de mi familia. Ahora necesito hacerle algunas mejoras a mi casa, por lo que necesito comprar mas mercaderia para satisfacer a mis clientes brindandoles ropa interior variada y de esta manera tener mejores ingresos para reparar mi casa.

loans.use: Compra de ropa interior para dama y caballero.

loans.name: Esteban

texts.en:
My name is Esteban and I have an Ice Cream stand. My means of transportation is a bicycle, I have had my business for several years and it helps me to generate income to cover family expenses and studies and other obligations, and I need more products in order to offer my clients a broader selections.

Loan Use: Purchase of ice cream, disposable cups, sorbet, napkins, plastic spoons and other items

Mi Nombre es Esteban, cuento con un negocio de venta de Ice Cream de forma ambulante, mi medio de transporte es una bicicleta, tengo varios años de dedicarme a este tipo de actividad el que me genera ingresos para cubrir mis gastos familiares, de estudio y otros compromisos, actuamente necesito mas producto para poder ofrecer a mis clientes mayor variedad.

loans.use: Compra de Ice Crean, Vasos desechables, sorbete, Servilletas, Cucharitas planticas  otros

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.en:
Hello! My name is Pedro and my business is a shoe store. I make and sell shoes in my community and in nearby neighborhoods. I also repair shoes. I have been dedicated to this for years now and I earn enough income to support my business and family. Now, I need to buy materials to make more styles of shoes and sandals. My dream is to build a house and if I can work more with more products, I can achieve my goal.

Loan Use: Purchase of leather, glue, a sewing machine and other materials.

Hola mi nombre es Pedro y mi negocio es una zapateria, yo fabrico y vendo zapatos en mi comunidad y otras aldeas vecinas. Tambien reparo zapatos. Tengo varios años de dedicarme a esta actividad, la que me ha generado ingresos para sostener mi negocio y mi familia. Ahora necesito comprar materiales para fabricar mas estilos de zapato, sandalias. Mi sueño es construir mi casa y se que voy a lograrlo trabajando mas y vendiendo mas producto.

loans.use: Compra de cuero, pegamento, maquina de costurar y otros

payments.comment: Por la epoca escolar mis ventas fueron bastante buenas, por lo que me quede sin materia prima para fabricar mas calzado, por lo que necesito comprar material para surtir escuelas y fabricar sandalias de verano, gracias por su ayuda.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.en:
I repair electrical household goods in my city. This is a good business since there are few repair shops for electrical household goods. My business has grown and I have two young people that help me work from home. Thanks to the aid I have been offered, I have been able to increase my income and help my children pay for school.

Loan Use: Purchase Electrical and other supplies

Me dedico a la reparacion de electrodomesticos en mi ciudad, que es un buen negocio ya que casi no existen talleres de reparacion de electrodomesticos. Mi negocio ha crecido ya que tengo dos jovenes que me ayudan y yo realizo trabajos a domicilio. Gracias a la ayuda que me han brindado he podido obtener mejores ingresos y ayudar a mis hijos en sus estudios.

loans.use: Compra de materiales electricos y otros.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.en:
My name is Juan Antonio. I grind corn to make tortillas. I have been doing this for two years which has generated profits to help me support my family. I am in need of making some repairs and improvements to the equipment in my business.

Loan Use: Purchase bands, plates, fat, water tank and other supplies

Mi Nombre es Juan Antonio, cuento con un molino de moler maiz producto del cual se elaboran las tortillas para comer, gengo 2 años de dedicarmen a este tipo de actividad la que me genera ingresos para cubrir mis gastos familiares, y otros compromisos, actualmente necesitamos hacerle algunas mejoras al molino ya que con el uso el mismo se deprecia.

loans.use: Compra de Bandas, platos, Grasa, Tanque  para el agua  otros

loans.name: Clementina

texts.en:
Clementina is 36 years old and is married. Unfortunately her husband physically abused her and finally abandoned her with two children. She had to support her two sons and decided to open a food business because she loves to cook. Initially she rented a place and started to sell breakfast and lunch. By working hard she was able to save some money and bought her own place. Now she needs to pay for a sanitary license in order to operate her business without problems. For this reason she is requesting a loan of US $ 475 to re-model her place, obtain the license and also better the installations so she can give her clients better service.

**"This text has been translated from the following original business description."

Clementina tiene 36 años de edad y esta casada, pero desafortunadamente su esposo la maltrataba físicamente y la abandono con dos hijos. En esa época ella entonces tuvo que hacerse cargo de su familia y entonces lo que hizo fue en poner un negocio de comida que era lo que ella sabía hacer bien. Inicialmente alquilo un local y empezó vendiendo almuerzos y comidas corridas, trabajando duro logro que su negocio creciera y pudo juntar dinero para comprar su propio local de comidas. Ahora ella para poder tener su puesto es necesario tener un permiso sanitario que le permita operar sin problemas, por ello esta solicitando un crédito de US$ 475 para realizar una remodelación de su local, lo que le permitirá obtener el permiso de sanidad, y al mismo tiempo mejorar sus instalaciones para dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.

loans.use: To make over her business place

loans.name: Haydee

texts.en:
I am a retailer that sells creams, underwear and sandals. I keep my products in my home and sell in various neighborhoods in my city. At this time, I need to invest capital in order to increase my inventory and gain more income in order to better support my family.

Loan Use: This loan will be used to purchase lotions, creams, sandals and ladies underwear

Soy comerciante me dedico a la venta de cremas, ropa interior, sandalias. Mi producto lo tengo en mi casa ya que las ventas las hago de manera ambulante, visito barrios y colonias de mi ciudad. En esta epoca necesito invertir capital de trabajo para surtir mi inventario y poder obtener mayores ingresos y apoyar a mi familia mucho mas.

loans.use: Compra de lociones, cremas, sandalias, ropa interior para dama.

loans.name: Silvia Maribel

texts.en:
My name is Silvai Maribel. I have had a grocery store for several years which generates enough to cover family expenses and the education of my son. I need to supply my business since the Christmas season is coming and people want different products.

Loan Use: Purchase sugar, beans, butter, rice, soap, eggs, meats and other products

Mi Nombre el Silvai Maribel, cuento con una Pulperia de venta de productos de consumo humano,tengo varios años de dedicarme a este tipo de activida, generandome ingresos para cubrir los gastos familiares y de educacion de mis hijo, necesito surtir mas mi negocio ya que se aproxima la navidad por lo que hay demando de los diferentes productos.

loans.use: compra azucar, frijoles, manteca,arroz, jabon,uhevos, productos lactos,carnes, embutidos y otros

payments.comment: This is a correction of a previous payment posted in error.

loans.name: Norma Leticia

texts.en:
My name is Norma A.. I sell a great variety of women\'s shoes. I have had my business for three years. My sales are done by order. My clients are my neighbors and coworkers. My business generates enough profit to support my family. My goal is to increase my profits in order to remodel my home and pay for my daughter\'s education.

Loan Use: This loan will be used to purchase shoes, sandals and slippers

Mi nombre es Norma A. me dedico a la venta de zapatos para damas en gran variedad, tengo mi negocio hace hace 3 años, mis ventas son por encargos y mis clientes son mis vecinos y mis compañeros de trabajo, mi negocio me genera ingresos para el sustento de mi familia, mi meta es incrementar mi inventario para tener mayores ventas y asi poder remodelar mi casa y dale estudio a mi hija.

loans.use: Compra de Zapatos , sandalias, chancletas,

loans.name: Rita Maria

texts.en:
I have been selling used clothing for some time. The business is located in part of my house. My store is visited by many people because of variety of clothes and prices I have for everyone. Now, I buy better quality used clothing. My earnings help support my family and help pay for the education of my children.

Loan Use: Purchase bundles of used clothes

Me dedico a la venta de ropa clasificada desde hace algunos, el negocio lo tengo ubicado en una pieza de mi casa. Mi tienda es bastante visitada por la variedad de ropa que tengo y por la variedad de precios accesibles para todas las personas. Ahora compro ropa clasificada es decir de una mejor categoria. Los ingresos que percibo me ayudan a sostener a mi familia y ayudar a mis hijos en sus estudios.

loans.use: Compra de fardos de ropa clasificada.

payments.comment: This is a correction of a previous payment posted in error.

loans.name: Enma Grisel

texts.en:
My name is Emma B. and I make and sell fast food like burritos, breakfasts, bread with beans, cheese tortillas, enchiladas, baleadas(honduran taco) and lunches. I have had my business for 4 years and my daughters help me cook. I have good customers because my business is located in from of a high school, my business generates an income to support my family and my goal is to increase my inventory in order to increase sales and to satisfy my clients and with the profits remodel my home(business) andto fincance the education of my two children.

Loan Use: Purchase sausages, plantains, beans, tortillas, vegetables, butter, salt,oil, spices, sodas, fruits, cheese and bread.

Mi nombre es Enma B. me dedico a la produccion y venta de comidas rapidas, como ser burritas, desayunos, pan con frijoles, tortillas con quesillo, enchiladas, baleadas, almuerzos, tengo mi negocio hace 4 años y me ayudan a cocinar mis hijas, mi clientela es muy buena ya que estoy ubicada al frente de un colegio publico, mi negocio me genera ingresos para el sustento de mi familia, mi meta es incrementar mi inventario para poder vender mas comida y asi satisfacer a mis clientes y con las ganancias que obtenga poder remodelar mi negocio (casa) y darles estudio a mis dos hijas

loans.use: Compra de chorizos, platanos, frijoles, tortillas, vegetales, manteca, sal, aceite, especias, refrescos, frutas, queso, pan

loans.name: Irma

texts.en:
Hello, my name is Irma. I have a busines that sells ears of corn in heavily-traveled areas of my city. I have been doing this for several years and have been able to help my family develop with the income I earned. In my children\\\'s free time, they collaborate with me to create different things from corn.

Loan Use: Purchase of corn, sugar, firewood, salt, other supplies

Hola Mi nombre es Irma, cuento con un negocio de venta de elotes, ubicado en unos de los lugares mas transitados de mi comunidad, tengo varios años de dedicarmen a este tipo de actividad con la que he sacado adelante a mi familia, en sus tiempo libre mis hijos me colaboran en la elaboracion de los diferentes derivados del maiz.

loans.use: Compra de Elotes, azucar, leña, sal,  otros

loans.name: Argentina

texts.en:
My name is Argentina B.. I sell new clothing for women and babies. I have had my business for three years. I have a good customer base already. I sell my clothes in different offices. My business generates enough to support my family. My goal is to increase my inventory to have a greater variety of products. I hope to use the profit to remodel my house and pay for my son\'s education.

Loan Use: Purchase baby clothes, brasiers, blouses, trousers, socks

Mi nombre es Argentina B. me dedico a la venta de ropa nueva para damas y bebes, tengo mi negocio hace unos 3 años, mi clientela es muy buena ya que mi producto lo vendo en diferentes oficinas de trabajo, mi negocio me genera ingresos para el sustento de mi familia, mi meta es incrementar mi inventario para tener mas variedad de productos y asi poder tener mayores ventas y con la ganancia que obtenga poder remodelar mi casa de habitacion, el sustento de mi familia y el estudio de mi hijo.

loans.use: compra de ropa para bebes, brasiers, blusas, pantalones, calcetines, buzos, calzones

loans.name: Marilu

texts.en:
Mrs. Marilu O. is a very entrepreneurial woman. She started her own business after her husband left her. She can’t work on a regular job because her son is 3 years old and requires too much attention. She has to feed her son by herself and works very hard to get some income, that's why she started selling groceries in her store. Mrs. Marilu Contreras would like to have more products in her store and give a better service to her clients. She is asking for a loan of $800.00 and will pay back in 1 year.

Español

La Sra. Marilu O. es una señora muy emprendedora, la cual ha sabido enfrentar los problemas que le han acontecido en su vida, al sufrir el abandono de su esposo hace 2 años y tener que mantener a su hijo por si sola, esto la motivo a emprender un negocio de abarrotes, ya que como su hijo cuenta con 3 años de edad y requiere atención por parte de ella, no puede conseguir un empleo de forma regular, trabaja cada día muy duro para poder sostener a su hijo, por eso comenzó a vender abarrotes y quiere ampliar la variedad de productos y con esto obtener mayores ingresos en ventas, por lo cual solicita un préstamo de $800.00 los cuales piensa pagar en un plazo de un año.

loans.use: buy different products

loans.name: Jorge Yovani

texts.en:
My name is Jorge F.. I am dedicated to the sale of women\'s shoes. I have had my own business for three years which generates income to support my family. I already have very good clients and my business is located in the center of the city. My goal is to increase my inventory in order to have more variety of shoes and to have profits to support my family and pay for the studies of my son who is old enough to enter school.

Loan use: Purchase of slippers, sandals and shoes

Mi nombre es Jorge F. me dedico a la venta de zapatos para damas, tengo mi negocio hace 3 años y este me genera ingresos para el mantenimiento de mi familia, tengo muy buenos clientes ya que mi lugar de trabajo es en el centro de la ciudad, mi meta es incrementar mi inventario para poder tener mas variedad de zapatos y con las ganancias que tenga poder mantener mi familia y el estudio de mi hijo que ya tiene la edad para ingresar a la escuela.

loans.use: compra de chancletas, sandalias, zapatos

loans.name: Beaney

texts.en:
I had a grocery store on a main street of Danli for several years now. I have been running the business personally and have a strong customer base that prefers me for my personal treatment and good prices. I have been able to build a house and feed and educate my children with the profits. The business is growing and soon I will need another person to help me care for my clients.

Loan Use: Purchase of softdrinks, churros, cakes, milk, eggs and other products

Tengo varios años de tener mi negocio ubicado en una de las principales calles y de bastante transito en la ciudad de Danli, lo administro personalmente, durante este tiempo he sabido ganarme la confianza de las personas que me prefieren por el trato que les doy ademas de los productos de buena calidad y precios. Gracias a los ingresos que hemos obtenido he logrado contruir mi casa, y apoyar a mis hijos en sus estudios y alimentacion. El negocio esta creciendo por lo que pronto necesitare otra ayuda, asi que pienso contratar a otra persona que me pueda ayudar atender a mis clientes.

loans.use: Compra de refrescos, churros, galletas, leche, huevos y otros.

payments.comment: This is a correction of a previous payment posted in error.

loans.name: Maria Teodora

texts.en:
My name is Maria G.. I make and sell tortillas. I have had my business for four years with the help of my daughters that distribute my products. My clients are my neighbors, orders for celebrations and general stores and markets. My business earns enough for me to support my family. My goal is to increase inventory to have a greater production of tortillas. I hope to use the profits to remodel my house and support my family.

Loan Use: Purchase corn four, salt, lime, water, firewood and matches

Mi nombre es Maria G. me dedico a la produccion y venta de tortillas, tengo mi negocio hace 4 años y con la ayuda me mis hijas repartimos el producto terminado, mis clientes son mis vecinos, encargos para fiestas y repartir a pulperias y mercaditos, mi negocio me genera ingresos para el mantenimiento de mi familia, mi meta es incrementar mi inventario para tener una mayor produccion de tortillas y con las ganancias que obtenga poder remodelas mi casa de habitacion y mantener a mi familia.

loans.use: Compra de harina de maiz, sal, cal, agua, leña, fosforos

payments.comment: This is a correction of a previous payment posted in error.

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.en:
Mr. Virgilio M. has been dedicated to the sale of bread and cheese for 9 years. He sell his product in the streets of Nuevo Laredo with a small roller cart in which he transports a basket full of bread and a portable cooler full of cheese. He already has selected clients that buy his products every week. Mr. M. wants to sell more pieces of bread and cheese to his clients and save some money for an eye surgery. Mr. M. said "If I had that money I will be able to give a better service to my clients every week”. Mr. M. is asking for a loan of $900. He plans to invest this money in merchandise, increase the sales and reach his goals.

Español

El Sr. Virgilio M. se ha dedicado a la venta de panes y quesos desde hace 9 años. El vende su producto por las calles de la ciudad con un carrito de dos ruedas en donde transporta una hielera y un canasto llenos de mercancía, el ya cuenta con clientes selectos que adquieren sus productos. El desea incrementar sus ventas para poder pagarse una operación de la vista ya que tiene dificultades para ver, el dice: “Si yo tuviera ese dinerito tendría bien surtidos a mis clientes y no les fallaría con el producto semana tras semana”. Esta persona solicita un préstamo de $900.00 Su inversión principal será en mercancía. Él asegura que obteniendo la ayuda solicitada podrá realizar sus objetivos.

loans.use: buy ingredients for bread and cheese

loans.name: Saul

texts.en:
My Name is Saul G. Martinez. I have 2 years making brooms and mops and cleaning items. I sell them in houses and offices here in Nuevo Laredo. The income that I make is the only source for my family support. Saul is asking for a loan of $900. With this money he plans to increase the product line and fix his pick-up truck. It’s very important to remember that in this season his products have more demand.

Español

Mi nombre es Saúl García Martínez, tengo 2 años elaborando escobas y trapeadores para venderlos en casas y oficinas aquí en Nuevo Laredo, lo que gano en esta actividad es la principal fuente de sustento familiar. Estoy Solicitando un préstamo de $900.00 para incrementar la línea de productos y arreglar mi camioneta. Es importante mencionar que en estas fechas los productos tienen mayor demanda.

loans.use: more products

loans.name: Awa

texts.en:
This is a group loan to be shared by five members of the women’s savings association Jabboot, whose representative, Awa G., submitted the following business plan description:

“The women of the village who are members of the Jabboot Association are very active in weaving cloth for skirts and other articles of clothing, and those who are teachers have innovated with the sale of textbooks and school supplies in the local schools.

The overall objective of this project is to improve the profitability of the small-scale commercial activities of the Jabboot Association members. The first activity will consist of buying school books and supplies in bulk at a very good price, and reselling them at very fair prices in the schools, where the parents’ associations do not have a functioning cooperative. Throughout the year the pupils will need new school supplies and books. The second activity is the production and sale of skirts, blankets, bed sheets and other articles of clothing (robes etc).

Jabboot is a group whose members are quite active and experienced in the area of selling school supplies and school books; the lack of financial support has always been the obstacle to strengthening and expanding these activities. This is a group of women who dedicate themselves at the same time to the sale of skirts and other articles of clothing, and this activity is very profitable. With a little financial support the group members will make a great deal of profit, with a learning impact on other sectors such as traditional artisanry.

With the framework that the village committee has put in place for the management of this loan, we will fulfill all our responsibilities under the repayment plan, taking into account the time required for production at each stage, and the management plan will have as its goal adherence to the loan repayment schedule.”

Original French:

"Les membres ( femmes ) de l’ écovillage regroupées dans (JABBOOT) sont très actives dans le domaine du tissage des pagnes et autres effets vestimentaires mais les membres enseignants ont innové avec la vente de manuels et fournitures scolaires dans les écoles.

Objectif général : Améliorer les activités du petit commerce au profit des membres du groupement JABBOOT

ACTIVITES :

Activés 01

Il s’agira d’acheter dans un premier temps du matériel scolaire( manuels et fournitures) à de très bon prix et les revendre avec des prix très adaptés dans les écoles ou les associations des parents d’élevés n`ont pas de coopérative fonctionnelle. Durant toute l`année les élèves sont confrontés aux besoins de fournitures courants et de manuels.

Activité 02

Confection et commercialisation de pagnes, couvertures, draps de lit et autres effets vestimentaires ( robes et autres ) .

Conclusions : JABBOOT est un groupe de membres très actives est très expérimenté en matière de vente de fournitures et de manuel scolaire, le manque d`appui a toujours été le frein pour le renforcement et l’élargissement des activités. C`est un groupe de femmes qui s investit en même temps dans le petit commerce de pagnes et autres effets vestimentaires et cette activité est très rentable. Avec un peu d’appui les membres bénéficiaires tireront beau coups de bénéfices avec un effet entraînement. pour les autres secteurs comme l’artisanat. Avec les outils de gestions adaptés que le comité locale a mis en place pour la gestion du prêt nous prendrons toutes les dispositions vis a vis du plan de remboursement, en tenant compte du temps de production a chaque étape et le plan de suivi aura comme objectif le respect des délais d engagement (remboursements)"

Background

Senegal is one of the world’s poorest countries, yet its solid democratic tradition and highly developed associational life distinguish it from other countries in its income group. Especially remarkable are Senegal’s networks of rotating savings and credit associations, known as tontines. Commonly organized by groups of twenty to thirty housewives who live in the same village, the tontines provide poor women throughout the country with small loans to finance modest income-generating activities. Repayment rates within these associations are excellent, because they are based on local reputation and personal trust between the members. However, their financial resources are limited to the contributions of their members, frequently subsistence farmers with very little disposable income. This has prevented the traditional tontines from meeting the demand for rural microenterprise loans and restricted their impact on the economic development of their communities. Senegal Ecovillage Microfinance (SEM) works with our partner organization CRESP to bridge this gap by linking traditional village credit associations with outside sources of finance.

loans.use: School supply cooperative/Fabric and clothing manufacture

payments.comment: This is a correction of a previous payment posted in error.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a married father of three boys who has dedicated himself over the last 22 years to learning the insect and rodent extermination business. His wife helps him run the business by purchasing many of the supplies. Having worked in a laboratory in the past, his wife knows how to mix the proper chemicals and can spot a deal when it comes. When the company they worked for went out of business, it was Peter’s wife who encouraged him to open a business with the $10 they had 17 years ago. The C.’s children help sell their products door-to-door and in the locations in town where customers come to buy things of that nature. Peter is applying for this loan, partly so he can obtain the necessary sanitation registration which costs $100, as well as materials used everyday during business such as sealant and materials for presenting his work. Peter used to borrow from a loan shark, but now he has been given a chance to borrow well below the 15% monthly rates. His whole family helps run the business, and they all have worked hard to build the house they currently live in. They thank Kiva and Mifex for giving them an opportunity at financial independence.

Mifex offers its clients microinsurance and access to business training and educational programs. For more information about microfinance, Ecuador, and our services, please visit www.mifex.org.

loans.use: Peter is applying for this loan, partly so he can obtain the necessary sanitation registration which costs $100, as well as materials used everyday during business such as sealant and materials for presenting his work.

loans.name: Limamou

texts.en:
This loan will be shared by the seven members of the Propaf group, represented by Limamou S.. Their village, Ker Gu Mag, is located in the arid grasslands of central Senegal, where people depend on a mixture of subsistence agriculture and cash cropping for their livelihoods. The loan funds will be used to purchase stocks of local grains – principally millet and corn – during the harvest season when supply is abundant and prices are low. The grains will then be processed and sold at retail as flour and animal feed throughout the year.

loans.use: Millet and Corn Retail

loans.name: Awa

texts.en:
This is a group loan to be shared by the 28 members of a handicapped women’s group, Sant Yalla des Handicapés, who produce the vibrant hand-dyed fabrics and batiks that are popular for traditional clothing in West Africa. The group’s leader, Awa G., describes their business plan:

“The Social Development Funds Agency (AFDS) has already built a training center for the handicapped people of the Foundiougne region. Therefore, in the hope of making this resource useful over the long term, the women of the group solicit this loan in order to boost the incomes of its members. This is a cloth-dying project that fits well with this goal. The objectives of the loan are: 1) to create employment for young handicapped women and increase the income of the group’s members; 2) to enter the batik market, which is quite strong in the tourist city of Foundiougne; and 3) to continue to make use of the training center that has been provided to the group. Planned activities include: 1) the purchase of fabric and various other materials; 2) dying the fabric with the colors and designs that are ordered by customers or in vogue; and 3) selling the finished hand-dyed fabric. The training center has a display room that doubles as a boutique shop. Sales will be made on site or at customers’ homes, depending on the nature of the order. The loan will be repaid in accordance with the agreed schedule.”

Original French:

"L’Agence du Fonds de Développement Social (AFDS) a déjà construit un centre de formation à l’intention des handicapés du département de Foundiougne. Ainsi dans le but de pérenniser cet outil, les femmes du groupement sollicitent ce prêt afin d’augmenter les revenus de ses membres.

Ce présent projet de teinture entre dans ce cadre.

Objectifs du Prêt :

o Créer des emplois au bénéfice des jeunes filles handicapés et augmenter les revenus des membres du groupement

o Assurer la commande du marché du batik, très important à Foundiougne qui est une ville touristique.

o Pérenniser les activités du centre de formation par la mise à disposition de FDR

Activités :

- Achat de pièces et de matériels divers

- Teinture des pièces suivant les couleurs et les motifs commandés ou en vogue

- Vente des pièces déjà teintes

Le centre dispose d’une salle d’exposition qui fait en même temps office de boutique. La vente se fait sur place ou à domicile selon la nature des commandes. Le remboursement peut s’effectuer suivant les échéances fixées."

loans.use: Traditional Cloth Dying

loans.name: Alioune

texts.en:
This is a group loan to be shared by the ten members of the Thialene association, who hail from the tiny village of Nder at the edge of the Sahara desert in northern Senegal. Subsistence is always a battle in this arid region, where most people still depend on rain-fed cultivation of their staple crops: millet, yams and peanuts. Investment in irrigation here can improve crop yields dramatically, increasing the surplus that the villagers sell for much-needed cash. The leader of the Thialene group, Alioune S., describes their plan to invest loan funds in an irrigation pump:

“The loan will be used to provide the group members with an irrigation pump with a capacity of 300 cubic meters per hour, which can irrigate 10 hectares of land. The pump will be managed by a maintenance person who will take charge of ensuring its good working condition. The team overseeing this project will make regular visits to all the fields where the pump is being used, and as soon as the first harvests begin we will start to collect the loan repayment without any difficulty.”

Original French:

"Il s’agit de mettre à la disposition des membres du groupement un groupe moto pompe d’une capacité de 300m3/heure pouvant irrigué 10 ha de culture et sera géré par un pompiste qui assurera l’entretien et le fonctionnement. L’équipe de suivi du projet fera des descentes dans tous les projets et dès la fin des premiers récolte commencera à faire le recouvrement des crédits sans difficulté."
